#summary Wunderground uploads.

= Introduction =

Upload weather data to wunderground.com.


= Details =

wunderground.com, or Weather Underground, is an internet based weather service. Visit wunderground.com and create an account before proceeding with the configuration.

The input for wunderground.com is an URL submitted to the following URL: 

http://weatherstation.wunderground.com/weatherstation/updateweatherstation.php

fowsr supports the following variables that is read from the weather station:

`dateutc=2010-03-14%2005:35:38&winddir=270.0&windspeedmph=0.0&windgustmph=0.0&humidity=32.0&tempf=65.5&rainin=0.4&baromin=292.8<br>
